text: Alplerinin önünde yaka paça götürtme kendini.

english: If we can't find a cure...
...they will die writhing in agony, sir.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, bizi Bahadır Bey zehirledi.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, Bahadır Bey poisoned us.
going to go talk to your Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Bahadır Bey, Karaca Hatun da gelecek.
english: Mr. Bahadır, Karaca Hatun will also be coming. Look at
What does he want from my wife?

text: Onu Ertuğrul Bey'im bilir. İkinizi de çağırdı.
english: Ertuğrul Bey knows that. He invited both of you.

text: Bahadır Bey'le Karaca Hatun'u getirdik beyim.
english: Bahadır Bey and Karaca Hatun, my lord.
(Groaning) My daughter. I will make life hell for
those who ruined your wedding day,
I came to help as soon as I saw them.
You chased me out of the tent.
Now, why did you call me, Ertuğrul Bey? They poisoned

text: Turgut Alp'le Aslıhan Hatun'u zehirlediler Bahadır Bey.
english: Turgut Alp and Aslıhan Hatun, Mr. Bahadır.
...your hatred, you have disturbed the peace of the village.
You did not give Aslıhan Hatun and Turgut any peace. There's no one else who can

text: Bu işi senden başka yapacak kimse yoktur Bahadır Bey.
english: do this job besides you, Mr. Bahadır.

text: İmdi de zehirlemekle mi suçlarsın beni?
english: Now you're accusing me of poisoning?
You never knew me, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Eğer onları öldürecek olsam bunu bir er gibi pusatımla yapardım.
english: If I were going to kill them, I would do it like a soldier, with my weapon. Do

text: ...Çavdarların başına bey olmak istediğini bilmez miyim sanırsın Bahadır Bey?
english: you think I don't know, Mr. Bahadır, that you want to become the bey of the Çavdars by teaming up with Emir Sadeddin?
...it was by the order of the state. If
...then you should do everything in your power to punish it .
If you are the border lord...
...then I am the lord of the Ryelands. Your
authority doesn't apply to me, Ertuğrul Bey.
I know his intentions very well. You will make
Turgut the chieftain of the tribe... and
you will exile me, just like my son.
...you've made all the Çavdars your prey.

text: ...avın elinden gitti diye midir bütün bu öfken ha?
english: all this anger because your prey slipped from your grasp? I
I'll take your head, Mr. Bahadır. Really

text: Bizi boş yere suçlarsın Ertuğrul Bey.
english: You are accusing us wrongly, Ertuğrul Bey.
We will not be defeated by this.
Take Mr. Bahadır to the prison tent.
Karaca Hatun will not leave her tent either.
(Ertuğrul) Have the Alps wait in front of the tent.
I will speak to each of them individually.

text: Ama o aç gözünü kanla doyurana dek...
english: But until he satisfies his insatiable greed with blood...

text: ...karşında dimdik duracağım, bunu da iyi belleyesin.
english: I will stand firm against him, remember that well.
our Ertuğrul Bey enters the castle...
...our blessed banner will be planted on the walls.
they poisoned Aslıhan Hatun. They are on their
We don't know who did it yet.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im hem kimin yaptığını öğrenmek...
english: Ertuğrul Bey postponed the raid both to find out who did it and to rescue

text: ...hem de Turgut Alp'le Aslıhan Hatun'u kurtarmak için baskını erteledi.

english: Then you return to the camp.
I will stay in the castle.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im, Nikea'dan gelen tüccarı yakalayıp...
english: Ertuğrul Bey wants you to capture the merchant from Nicaea and
bring him back safe and sound.

text: Alplerim obaya dönecek. Ben de seninle geleceğim.
english: My Alps will return to the village. I'll come with you too. Let's set off quickly then
The merchant needs to be caught before he gets too close to the castle.
Sir, news arrived from Titan via carrier pigeon . Ah!
So, he managed to infiltrate the Kayi tribe. It means we've

text: Sonunda en büyük düşmanımızın içine sızdık demek.
Bakalım Kayılar hakkında bize ne anlatacak.
english: Let's see what it will tell us about the Kayı tribe .

text: Turgut Alp'le Aslıhan Hatun düğün gecesinde zehirlenmişler.
english: Turgut Alp and Aslıhan Hatun were poisoned on their wedding night.

text: Bu sizi neden bu kadar endişelendirdi efendim?
english: Why does this worry you so much, sir?
Turks are killing each other again. We cannot incur

text: Ertuğrul'un şüphesini ve öfkesini üzerimize çekemeyiz Kostas.
english: Ertuğrul's suspicion and anger, Kostas. This ties our hands

text: Savaş hazırlıkları devam ederken bu elimizi kolumuzu bağlar.

english: Who could have done this, sir? He's the kind of person who would

text: Ertuğrul'u ezmek için beni bile kullanabilecek biri.
english: even use me to crush Ertuğrul .

text: Ertuğrul, sultanı arkasına alarak Emir Sadeddin'i bu topraklardan...
english: Ertuğrul, with the Sultan's support, not only sent Emir Sadeddin away from these lands... ...but also...

text: Uç beyi yapmak istediği Bahadır Bey'i ezdi.
english: He crushed Bahadır Bey, whom he wanted to make the border lord.
He even sent his son into exile.

text: Öyleyse Sadeddin onları neden zehirlemiş olabilir efendim?
english: So why might Sadeddin have poisoned them, sir?

text: Ertuğrul, Emir Sadeddin'in nişanlısı Aslıhan Hatun'u...
english: Ertuğrul wanted to make Aslıhan Hatun, Emir Sadeddin's fiancée, the
But we cannot allow Ertuğrul to suspect us...
So, what will you do, sir? Rather than facing
the greed and hypocrisy of Emir Sadeddin, I would prefer to confront

text: ...Ertuğrul Bey gibi yiğit bir savaşçıyla karşı karşıya kalmayı tercih ederim.
english: a valiant warrior like Ertuğrul Bey .
We are going to Çavdar Obası. Let's show

text: Ertuğrul Bey'e bu zor gününde yanında olduğumuzu gösterelim.
english: Ertuğrul Bey that we are with him during this difficult time . Get my
Hopefully no one was following. Don't
All right, thank God. Neither of
His Highness the Emir sent his greetings.

text: Vazifeni yerine getirmen karşılığında sana bu mükafatı vermemi emretti.
english: He ordered me to give you this reward for fulfilling your duty.
Whose dogs are you, you bitches?
This is Bamsi, Ertuğrul's Alp. You should ask

text: Turgut'la Aslıhan Hatun'u kim zehirletti diyesin.
english: who poisoned Turgut and Aslıhan Hatun .
...where is the cure for the poison?!

text: (Alpamış) Onlar gibi seni de cehenneme yollayacağım.
english: (Alpamış) I will send you to hell just like them .
I will not draw my sword on you. You

text: İmdi, imdi bastım mı senin böğrüne?
english: Now, now, did I press down on your side?
You will sing like a nightingale now.
What is the situation, Artuk Bey?
Things are not very good, sir.
First, as I said... I need to find out if there is

text: ...zehrin şerbette olup olmadığını anlamam icap eder.
english: poison in the syrup or not.

text: İşte o vakit zehrin ne olduğunu bilir...
english: That's when we know what the poison is...
...and we can give a cure accordingly.
I brought your bag, Artuk Bey.
You need to hurry, Artuk Bey.

text: Samsa, tez içeriden şerbet testisini getiresin.
english: Samsa, quickly bring the sherbet jug from inside .

text: İmdi şerbete zehir konmuş mudur, konmamış mıdır onu anlayacağız beyim.
english: Now we will find out whether or not poison has been added to the syrup, sir.

text: Zehir şerbetteyse mor bir renge bürünecektir beyim.
english: the poison is in the syrup, it will turn a purple color, sir.
The poison is in the syrup.
(Samsa) The command is yours, my lord.
Where can the cure for poison be found?
Let's leave before Bamsi sees us.

text: Turgut'la Aslıhan Hatun'u kim zehirletti, diyesin hele.
english: who poisoned Turgut and Aslıhan Hatun? So
you might ask, where will we find a cure for poison?
Where can we find a cure for poison?
Say it. Tell them not to go.

text: Bu nefeslerinin kesilmesini bir vakit engeller beyim.
english: This will temporarily prevent them from losing their breath, sir.

text: Şişe bitince ne olacak Artuk Bey?
english: What will happen when the bottle is empty, Mr. Artuk? There will be nothing left for us

text: Bu sebeptendir ki vücutlarından zehrin tez atılması için şifa bulmamız icap eder.
english: That is why we need to find a cure so that the toxins can be quickly removed from their bodies.
(Sound of a door opening) (Ertuğrul) We'll find him. Sir

english: Neither Bamsi nor Esma are anywhere.
(Bamsi) Get out of the way. May you
Where is Esma? Who is this man?
My lord, my lord, Esma had run away from the tribe. I

text: Ben de dediğin gibi onu takip ettim.
english: followed him, just like you said.

text: (Bamsı) Beyim, obanın dışında bu herifle buluşmuşlardır.
english: (Bamsi) Bey and this fellow met outside the camp.

text: Bu herif Esma'ya bir kese altın vermiştir.
english: This guy gave Esma a bag of gold.

text: Anladım ki ikisi de işin içindedirler beyim.
english: I understand that both of them are involved, sir.

text: Beyim, sonra bu soysuz Esma'yı öldürdü.
english: My lord then killed this vile Esma.
(Bamsi) I suddenly appeared and caught him. I was
just about to bring it to you when...
...someone came, shot them with an arrow, and ran away, sir.
My lord, I had no horse, so I couldn't follow them. I

text: Ben de belki işe yarar diye ölüsünü getirdim.
english: brought his dead body, thinking it might be useful.

text: Bu adam kim? Sizin obadan mı?
english: Who is this man? Are you from your village?
No, sir. This is Alpamysh. He is the
Alp of Bahadır Bey's tribe. Didn't I tell

text: Sana obadan kimse dışarı çıkmayacak demedim mi Kırca?
english: you, Kirca, that no one from the camp would leave?

text: Bu adamın obanın dışında ne işi var?
english: What is this man doing outside the village?
My lord, Alpamış has never come to the encampment.
Alpamysh did not come with us.
Our tribe would follow us from behind.
We don't know what he's doing here.

text: Beyim, beyim, belli ki Bahadır pis işleri için bu herifi kullanmıştır.
english: Sir, sir, it's clear Bahadır used this guy for his dirty work.

text: Haydi, haydi gardaşlar, alasınız şunun leşini.
english: Come on, come on brothers, go and get his carcass.

text: Alpamış gizlice Esma'yla obanın dışında buluştu.
english: Alpamish secretly met Esma outside the camp.
So, Esma was the one who gave the poison, huh?

text: Bir de bana kadın başına beylik taslarsın.
english: And you, a woman, dare to lord over me.

text: Esma hainse, Alp'in Alpamış da haindir Bahadır Bey.
english: Esma is a traitor, then Alp's Alpamış is also a traitor, Mr. Bahadır.

text: Esma'ya zehirlemesi için Alpamış'a talimatı sen verdin.
english: You gave Alpamış the order to poison Esma.

text: Boş laflara karnım toktur Ertuğrul Bey.

english: Alpamish the dog was going to come with my aba.
I don't know what he's doing here. You
You gave the order to Alpamysh. You
lured Esma with gold and then poisoned her.

text: Alpamış iti kim bilir kimlere köpeklik etti?
english: Who knows whose lapdog Alpamish was?

text: Ha, niyetin benim işimi bitirmekse, buyur burada bitir Ertuğrul Bey.
english: Ah, if your intention is to finish me off, go ahead and finish me off right here, Ertuğrul Bey. Let's both be

text: Ta ki o işi yapan hain bir gün...
english: one day, that traitor who did that deed...
You still say you didn't do it.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, senden de, ölümden de korkmuyorum.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, I fear neither you nor death.
Do whatever you're going to do.
But you know, I didn't do it!
I will give him his punishment when I get there.
What are you doing here, Ares?

text: Belki bir faydam dokunur diye geldim.
english: came hoping I could be of some help. So

text: Buradan Hanlı Pazar'a kadar herkes olanları duydu Ertuğrul Bey.
english: Everyone from here to Hanlı Bazaar heard what happened, Ertuğrul Bey. My

text: Hangi ahmak bu kadar geç öldüren bir zehir yapar ki?

text: Ölmeden evvel acı çekmelerini isteyen biri.
english: Someone who wants them to suffer before they die.

text: Ne kadar büyük bir kin bu böyle.

english: What will happen, Bamsi Alp? We

text: Düştük bir ormana gardaş, yol belli değildir.
english: 've fallen into a forest, brother, the path is unclear.
How can I trust you, Ares?

text: Bana dostluk eli uzatan bir uç beyine yardım için geldim.
english: I came to help a leading figure who extended a hand of friendship to me. Is
n't this enough? I learned that
while I was away, he [Emir Sadeddin] conspires with someone to seize
How can I trust your word?

text: Sulhta ikimiz de ticareti geliştirmek istedik.
english: In peacetime, we both wanted to develop trade.

text: Bahadır Bey'in Hanlı Pazar'ı almak için verdiği altınlar...
english: Of the gold that Bahadır Bey gave to buy Hanlı Bazaar...
You're a very clever man, Ertuğrul Bey.
Emir Sadeddin's reign has ended. From now on,

text: Bundan sonra sulhu da, ticareti de seninle yürüteceğimi bilirim.
english: I know I will conduct both peace and trade with you. From now on, you're the

text: Bundan sonra benim iş yapacağım adam sensin.
english: man I'll be doing business with.

text: Turgut'la Aslıhan için elinden ne gelir?
english: What can Turgut and Aslıhan do for him?

text: Bunu kimin yaptığını bilemem ama sana sürebileceğin bir iz verebilirim.
english: I don't know who did this, but I can give you a lead you can follow.
I had my doubts before coming here.

text: Ama bunu yapan kişinin öldürmekten çok acı çektirmek...
english: But when the person who did this said they wanted to inflict pain rather than kill...
From the herbalist who made this poison. I'm absolutely certain who made

text: Aslıhan ve Turgut için bu zehri kimin yaptığından adım gibi eminim.
english: this poison for Aslıhan and Turgut .
Nicaea was a well-known and respected herbalist.
A former priest who has renounced his faith.

text: Öldürmeyip de acı çektirebilecek kadar usta biri.
english: Someone skilled enough to inflict pain without killing.
Where can I find him? I heard he lives
at the foot of Hell's Peak . He had retreated to

text: Oradaki vadinin dibinde bir mağarada inzivaya çekilmiş.
english: a cave at the bottom of the valley there .

text: Eğer papazı bulursan belki Aslıhan ve Turgut'a yardım edebilirsin.
english: If you find the priest, perhaps you can help Aslıhan and Turgut.

text: Ben de bir dosta yardım eli uzatmış olurum.
english: I would also be lending a helping hand to a friend.

text: Sana baş sağlığı dileyeceğime genç âşıklara uzun bir ömür dilerim belki kim bilir?
english: Instead of offering my condolences to you, perhaps I'll wish the young lovers a long and happy life, who knows?

text: Ama elimden gelen budur Ertuğrul Bey.
english: But this is all I can do, Ertuğrul Bey.
With your permission, I will leave Commander Kostas here.
I want to be informed about what's going on.
Bamsi has been following Esma. He saw

text: Alpamış'ın onu öldürdüğünü görüp onu yakaladı.
english: Alpamysh kill him and captured him.

text: Neyse ki vaktinde yetiştik Emir Hazretleri.
english: Thankfully, we arrived just in time, Your Highness.
We finished the job before Bamsi could get Alpamış to talk.
We left without them seeing us.
Bamsi will definitely take the body to the camp. When

text: Ertuğrul da cesedin Bahadır'ın Alp'i Alpamış'a ait olduğunu öğrenince...
english: Ertuğrul learns that the body belongs to Bahadır's Alp, Alpamış... So far,

text: İmdiye kadar her şey istediğimiz gibi gidiyor Göktuğ.
english: everything is going as we wanted, Göktuğ. I

english: have one more task to give you.

text: Zehri yapan otacıyı bul ve öldür.
english: Find the herbalist who made the poison and kill him. Let's
They won't find the cure that will heal Turgut and Aslıhan.
going to get really messy around here.

text: Ve düzeni temin etmek için Ertuğrul'un kellesini alacağım.
english: And to restore order, I will take Ertuğrul's head.

text: Artuk Bey! Artuk Bey, Aslıhan Hatun nefes almıyor.
english: Artuk Bey! Artuk Bey, Aslıhan Hatun is not breathing.
(Halime) Artuk Bey, what are we going to do?

text: -(Halime) Bacım, bacım. -(Hayme) Turgut, kendine gel evladım.
english: -(Halime) My sister, my sister. -(Hayme) Turgut, come to your senses, my son.
(Halime) Open your mouth. Mr. Artuk isn't opening it.
Halime Sultan, give this to him to drink.

text: Gayrı güneş batana kadar bile sağ çıkacaklarından emin değilim.
english: I'm not even sure they'll survive until sunset.

text: Zehri yapan otacının kim olduğunu, nerede olduğunu bildiğini söyledi.
english: He said he knew who the herbalist was who made the poison and where he was.
Emir Sadeddin's reign is over, he said.
He said he wanted to deepen our friendship.
Bastard! How can we know what you're

text: Lakin elimizden başka bir şey de gelmez.
english: But there's nothing else we can do.
Both of them are on their deathbeds.

text: Ben tez yola koyulayım o vakit.
Beyim, müsaadenle ben de seninle geleyim.
english: Sir, with your permission, I would like to come with you. There is nothing more I can

text: Burada benim yapacağım bir şey kalmamıştır.
english: do here. There is nothing more I can do for either

text: Aslıhan Hatun için de, Turgut Alp için de gayrı elimden bir şey gelmez.
english: Aslıhan Hatun or Turgut Alp . If

text: Ares haklıysa, hekimliğim gittiğin yerde lazım olacaktır beyim.
english: Ares is right, my medical skills will be useful wherever you go, sir.
-(Ertuğrul) Let's set off together. -(Artuk) Thank you, sir.

Sir, he sends his regards. The
poison you made is quite potent. He
wants you to make another bottle.
My lord, my lord, my lord, my lord.
What's wrong, Bamsi? Are there any traces?

text: Vardır. Hem de taze izlerdir beyim.
english: there are. And these are fresh marks, sir.

text: Belli ki bizden önce birileri gelmiştir buraya.
english: Clearly, someone has been here before us.

text: Zehri yaptıran soysuzlar, otacıyı öldürmek için gelmiş olabilirler.
english: The scoundrels who ordered the poison may have come to kill the herbalist. Come on

text: De haydi Alpler, önce bulalım şu mağarayı, haydi.
english: Alps, let's find that cave first, come on.

text: Demek zehrin şifasını da gene bu yılanın zehrinden yapmak gerek.

nobody will be able to do it.
Why are you killing me? We
don't like our secrets being shared.
destroyed your only hope. There is nothing left that can

english: Ensure the safety of the surrounding area, Alps.
never know what might happen inside.
we arrived at the devil's lair?
Those scoundrels killed him to leave no trace.

text: Beyim, şifa, ya şifayı nasıl bulacağız?
english: Sir, healing, but how will we find healing?

He killed them so that we wouldn't use the poison to make a cure.

...it is important enough to take heads and save heads. We

My daughter. Hold on, my child, hold on.
Almost there, just hang in there.
Yes... Just hold on... Just a little longer.

text: -(Hayme) Ah yavrum! -(Halime) Hafsa, sen dur. Ana, gel.

sun is about to set, Bamsi.

My sister? Are you ok? Uh huh.

english: Turgut is fine. It will get even better, my dear.

n't tire yourself out. You will get better.

...His Highness the Emir wishes to see you in his presence .

english: Sir, Ertuğrul Bey has returned to the camp.

text: Zehri yapan papazı bulup, panzehri getirmişler.

text: Şimdi bize iki can borcu var.
english: Now they owe us two lives.

text: Artık ona karşı elimizde güçlü bir koz var.
english: Now we have a powerful trump card against him.

text: Peki, bundan sonra ne yapacaksınız efendim?

Now we have earned Ertuğrul's trust, Kostas.

text: Bundan sonra kozumuzu en iyi şekilde kullanacağız.

if I hadn't witnessed the great victories you achieved in numerous battles...

same scoundrels? Don't you see that
